nodes.title: Open-source MQTT broker - EMQX
nodes.summary: Open-source MQTT broker for IoT, IIoT, and connected vehicles

product.summary: Open-source MQTT broker for IoT, IIoT, and connected vehicles
Open source message broker which implements MQTT
Open-source MQTT broker for IoT, IIoT, and connected vehicles
Open source message broker which implements MQTT
High-performance coordination service for distributed applications
A distributed messaging and streaming platform
the most widely deployed open source message broker
An open source messaging and Integration Patterns server

overview.overview: EMQX is an open-source, highly scalable, and feature-rich MQTT broker designed for IoT and real-time messaging applications.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
EMQX supports up to 100 million concurrent IoT device connections per cluster while maintaining a throughput of 1 million messages per second and a sub-millisecond latency.

EMQX supports various protocols, including MQTT (3.1, 3.1.1, and 5.0), HTTP, QUIC, and WebSocket. It also provides secure bi-directional communication with MQTT over TLS/SSL and various authentication mechanisms, ensuring reliable and efficient communication infrastructure for IoT devices and applications.
